title: Chapter 2: Isaac ROS for VSLAM and Navigation
description: This chapter focuses on Isaac ROS, NVIDIA's collection of GPU-accelerated perception and navigation packages that integrate with the Robot Operating System (ROS). Isaac ROS provides accelerated computer vision, visual SLAM (VSLAM), and navigation capabilities specifically designed for robotics applications.
